text: aur hamane, ibraaheem ko (putr) ishaaq tatha (pautr) yaaqoob pradaan kiye. pratyek ko hamane maargadarshan diya aur usase pahale hamane nooh ko maargadarshan diya aur ibraaheem kee santati mein se daavood, sulaimaan, ayyoob, yoosuph, moosa tatha haaroon ko. isee prakaar ham sadaachaariyon ko pratiphal pradaan karate hain
